casebody.data:
Central of Georgia Railway Company v. Wallace. Argued July 6, Reargued October 5, Decided December 14, 1903. Dorsey, Brewster & Howell and Howell C. Erwin, for plaintiff in* error. Hoke Smith & H. C. Peeples and J. J. Hastings, contra.

This case being for decision by a full bench, and the six Justices being evenly divided in opinion, the judgment stands affirmed by operation of law.

Action for damages. Before Judge Reid. City court of Atlanta. December 13, 1902.
